"Ah, hello comrade...": "Oh, it's nothing. I was just practicing with another class but..."
"There's so many more things I want to kill. Lisa already killed all of the enemies ahead of us."
"Oya oya? He was talking to you? Well, that makes sense then."
"Um, don't you think you're overdoing it even a little Lisa?"
"You think? The enemy is the enemy, so it doesn't matter how much of their blood you splatter, right?"
"Ah, don't worry. We're just practicing, so I won't get too carried away and blow your brains out or anything."
"So relax a little, Ohza. Just cooperate with Lisa to murder aaaaaaall of our enemies."
"Well, as a Hunter/Ranger pair, that sounds about right but..."
"Exactly! Let's go! If we don't kill a lot more, then we can't call it practice, right?"
